attributes.action: continue with his robust approach towards Zimbabwe and the regime of Robert Mugabe, as shown by his boycott of the EU-Africa summit, and to press for tougher EU sanctions against the Zimbabwean regime, in order to bring democracy and ultimate economic prosperity to the country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Because of Robert Mugabe's disastrous economic policies, Zimbabwe has gone from being the "Bread Basket of Africa" to a country devastated by famine, with inflation running to millions per cent.  In addition, civil liberties such as freedom of speech and assembly, and free and fair elections, are virtually non-existent.

rejection.details: The Prime Minister is already pursuing this action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
